title: Lovely, Convenient, Vintage Pitched Roof Triple Decker!
posting_body: ['Charming 2nd floor 3 bdrm,1 bath apartment, in owner occupied triple decker, conveniently located in a quiet Forest Hills neighborhood.', ' Traditional eat-in kitchen with pantry, living room with china cabinet, front and back porches with excellent views.', ' Shared free washer and dryer in cellar.', ' 9 minute walk to Orange Line train and busses, 5  minute walk to various restaurants, 4 minutes to the excellent Leland Street Garden, 4 minutes to the eccentric Wenham Street Cinema.', '  15 minute walk to the Happy Market, maybe 20 to JP Center.', ' More photos to be added (?where are they?)', 'so check back for more.', ' Also:  Landlord is somewhat flexible re: time frames.', ' In person viewings can be arranged after initial contacts/conversation.', ' Building is mammal-pet and fragrance free; fragrance-free laundry detergent is provided at no charge.', ' There is no smoking anywhere on the premises.', 'Owner prefers tenants who are somewhat eco oriented, and willing to adhere to proper separation of trash from recyclables.', ' Interested persons who do  not have a group of three can  request to connect with others who may want to consider this surprisingly various, healthy, rather artsy neighborhood.']
